name: Bandit Cart
description:
Gameplay:

Steal the sheep and follow the track to get to the barn at the end. Spoiler alert: the track is infinite and there is no ending. But there is a quick way to reach the barn by using the truck ramp right at the corner of the grassy land to jump to the other land. I hope you enjoy this proof of concept.

Pro Tip: Release the accelerator or break right before any jump for better landing.

Controls:

Xbox Controller (Recommended):

B = Break and reverse.

X = Accelerate.

Left Joystick = Steer.

R = Respawn(Keyboard).

Keyboard:

- B = break and reverse.

- Arrow Keys to move the wheels.

R = Respawn (Keyboard).

Credits: 

Programmer - Tombot

Artist - Yusufu

Third party:

Skybox - Farland Skies - by Borodar: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/farland-skies-cl...
Sound track- Stone Fortress - by Legend(Bart):  https://opengameart.org/content/stone-fortress
